Artefact.Name: Sword of Striking
Artefact.Description: +1 to Hit

Artefact.Name: Sword of Battle
Artefact.Description: +1 Attack

Artefact.Name: Sword of Might
Artefact.Description: +1 Strenght

Artefact.Name: Biting Blade
Artefact.Description: -1 Armour save

Artefact.Name: Enchanted shield
Artefact.Description: 5+ Armour save

Artefact.Name: Talisman of Protection
Artefact.Description: 6+ ward save

Artefact.Name: Dispell Scroll
Artefact.Description: automatically dispel an enemy spell, one use only

Artefact.Name: Power Stone
Artefact.Description: +2 dice to cast a spell

Artefact.Name: Staff of Sorcery
Artefact.Description: +1 to dispell

Artefact.Name: War Banner
Artefact.Description: +1 Combat Resolution

Artefact.Name: Battleaxe of the Last WAAAGH!
Artefact.Description: In close combat the bearer receives a potentially whopping +D6 Attacks - roll randomly each combat round to see just how crazed the wielder is that particular turn. On a 6 the favour of Gork (or possibly Mork) is withdrawn from the wielder oner his attacks have been resolved - the Battleaxe of the Last Waaagh! then ceases to work at the end of that Close Combat phase.

Artefact.Name: Kleeva's Cleaver of Cleavage
Artefact.Description: All hits wound automatically. Armour saves are modified by the Strength of the bearer.

Artefact.Name: Krumpa's Club of Crumpin'
Artefact.Description: The Club of Cnimpin' allows no armour saves.

Artefact.Name: Basha's Big Aхе of Bashin'
Artefact.Description: The axe gives the wielder +2 Attacks in close combat.

Artefact.Name: Hacka's Sword of Hacking
Artefact.Description: Ihe Sword of Hackin' hits on 2+ regardless of the wielder's WS.

Artefact.Name: Fumpa's Club of Fumpin'
Artefact.Description: The Club of Fumpin confers +2 Strength to all close combat attacks made by the character fighting with it.

Artefact.Name: Kurbog's Curmudgeonly Clobbera
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: If an enemy model suffers one or more wounds (after saves) inflicted it may make no more Attacks in that combat engagement
Artefact.Description: If an enemy model suffers one or more wounds (after saves) inflicted by the Curmudgeonly Clobbera it may make no more Attacks in that combat engagement. If the victim is mounted or rides a chariot, then only the rider monster that actuallv suffers the wound is 'clobbered' and not the entire model/mount/etc. Only one model ran be 'clobbered' at a time. Other models that are hit whilst one is 'clobbered' suffer wounds as normal but no additional effects.

Artefact.Name: Porko's Pigstikka
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: +1 Strength extra Attack per rank in the enemy unit (up to a maximum of +3)
Artefact.Description: The Pigstikka gives the wielder +1 Strength on the turn he charges. In addition, on the turn he charges he also gets one extra Attack per rank in the enemy unit (up to a maximum of +3)

Artefact.Name: Ulag's Akk'rit axe
Artefact.Description: The wielder may re-roll any to hit rolls that miss

Artefact.Name: Duffa's Club of Duffin'
Artefact.Description: Duffa's Club of Duffin' strikes with +3 Attacks once in the game. The Orc player must declare that he's using the extra Attacks before he makes any rolls to hit. All 3 Attacks have to be used at the same time and the bearer has to roll со hit as usual. Duffa's Club only works once in the game.

Artefact.Name: Wollopa's One Hit Wunda
Artefact.Description: Wollopa's One Hit Wunda provides it user with +3S... but it only works once in the game. The player can decide to use the weapon after hits have been scored but before rolling for wounds. The +3S bonus applies to one hit that has been scored by the bearer that turn. Any other hits scored by the bearer are at normal Strength.

Artefact.Name: Armour of Protectyness
Artefact.Description: Counts as wearing armour (5+ armour save) which can be combined with other equipment normally. Also, the wearer discounts the first wound he suffers.

Artefact.Name: Armour of Mork
Artefact.Description: Counts as wearing armour (5+ armour save) which can be combined with other equipment normally. Also gives the wearer and the unit he is with Magic Resistance (2).

Artefact.Name: Ironskin Shield
Artefact.Description: Counts as a shield (6+ armour save) which can be combined with other equipment normally. Also gives the bearer a 4+ Ward save.

Artefact.Name: Armour of Gork
Artefact.Description: Counts as wearing armour (5+ armour save) which can be combined with other equipment normally. The wearer may re-roll failed armour saves.

Artefact.Name: Ugbkag's Lucky Shield
Artefact.SpecialRuleDescription: Discounts the first hit suffered in the battle
Artefact.Description: Counts as a shield (6+ armour save) which can be combined with other equipment normally. Also, the bearer discounts the first hit suffered in the battle.

Artefact.Name: Drog's Dead 'Ard Armour
Artefact.Description: Gives the wearer a 1+ armour save that cannot be improved.

Artefact.Name: Nobbla's 'Elmet
Artefact.Description: Gives the wearer a 6+ armour save and may be worn in addition to normal armour. Also gives the wearer a 6+ Ward save.

Hero.Name: Wurrzag
Hero.Description: Wurrzag Ud Ura Zahubu, Great Shaman of the Bone Nose Tribe

HandWeapon.Name: Bonewood Staff
HandWeapon.SpecialRuleDescription: Bound spell, power level 3: the staff contains a spell which turns Wurrzag's foes into Squigs

HandWeapon.Name: The Power Squig
HandWeapon.SpecialRuleDescription: At the end of either player's Magic phase, Wurrzag may store up to two unused dice from his pool in the Power Squig, in the next Magic phase these are released and added to the pool in addition to those he would normally have

Armour.Name: Baleful Mask
Armour.SpecialRuleDescription: Bound spell, power level 3: Gaze of Mork spell, requires no power dice to cast, all power is provided by the Mask itself

Special.SpecialRuleDescription: Adds +1 to the casting total of each spell he attempts
An enemy mount or monster may only make half its normal number of Attacks (rounded down) when in base contact
